mapper.select: SELECT tbgrant.id FROM tbgrant, tbgrantpart, tbgrantuser WHERE tbgrantpart.tbgrant_id = tbgrant.id AND tbgrantuser.tbgrant_id = tbgrant.id AND tbgrantuser.tbuser_id = #{tbuserId} AND tbgrantpart.cate = #{cate} AND tbgrantpart.content = #{content} AND tbgrant.deleted = 'N' AND tbgrantuser.deleted = 'N' AND tbgrantpart.deleted = 'N' ORDER BY tbgrantuser.created_at DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT tbgrant.id ,tbgrant.deleted ,tbgrant.process ,tbgrant.created_at as createdAt ,tbgrant.modified_at as modifiedAt ,tbgrant.title ,tbgrant.cate ,tbgrant.content FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id = #{id}

SELECT tbgrant.id FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id is not NULL AND tbgrant.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbgrant.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbgrant.created_at AND tbgrant.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbgrant.cate = #{cate} ORDER BY tbgrant.created_at ORDER BY tbgrant.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(tbgrant.id) as listsize FROM tbgrant WHERE tbgrant.id is not NULL AND tbgrant.deleted = #{deleted} AND tbgrant.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbgrant.created_at AND tbgrant.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbgrant.cate = #{cate}
